description: Malva is the Holo Caster news reporter and is also a member of the Kalos Elite Four. While at the Hyakkoku City Pok√©mon Center, Ash and his friends heard a broadcast with Mega Evolution-related news. She announced that Professor Sycamore would be visiting the sundial that day to conduct an investigation. She explained that according to one theory, the sundial came from space and that it is still shrouded in mysteries, but recent studies had revealed a deep connection to Mega Stones. His conclusions based on the investigation of the sundial were reported by her as being highly anticipated.
name: Pachira
